original_title: パラノーマルサイキック狂
overview: The third installment of the psychic documentary series. Kudo, whose older brother went missing in the previous interview, offered to interview the haunted house again. I went there with Wakana Yamashita, a talent with psychic powers. Mystery hunter Ri Koji also joined us, and once again there was a strange phenomenon...
title: Paranormal Psychic Madness
